title: About This Demo
content:
This is a demonstration of Decap CMS (formerly Netlify CMS) integrated with a React application running on Cloudflare Workers.

**Key Features:**

- ✅ Git-based content management
- ✅ No database required
- ✅ Content stored as JSON files
- ✅ Fast, edge-deployed with Cloudflare
- ✅ Modern React with TypeScript
- ✅ Tailwind CSS v4 for styling

All content on this page can be edited through the CMS admin interface at `/admin`.
